ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And wait. We too are waiting.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And wait (for what is to come), we are also waiting (to see)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And do wait for the end of things; we too are waiting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Wait, and I, too, will be waiting with you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And you wait! We (too) are waiting."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And wait; surely we are waiting also.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And watch and wait; we are also watching and waiting.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And wait! Lo! We (too) are waiting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and wait, we too are waiting."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And await; as verily we are awaiting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And wait! We too are waiting.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And wait ye! We too shall wait."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And you wait! We (too) are waiting."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And wait, indeed, we are waiting."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:122] And wait, for the consequence of your affair, we are also waiting’, for this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And wait) for my destruction! (Lo! we (too) are waiting) for your destruction.
